spawnpoint.name: Spawnpoint

girl.name: Amelia
girl.text: "Hey there! My name's Amelia! I see you're another newcomer, if you want to find anyone else, I'd advise that you go check out the town up north, or the Birdwatch Fort to the east. Speaking of Birdwatch, if you'd like to know anything more about them, I would tell you to head over to the Birdwatch Diner, it's just north of the town. Oh! If you ever need to be healed, I've heard there's a magic fountain around here somewhere... It's a dangerous world out there. See ya!"

guard.name: Birdwatch Guard
guard.text: "Protect and serve... Gotta make sure that everything is safe for the newcomers, ever since the war started, we've been in the crossfire, seeing as the opposing sides are directly south and west of here..."

spawnpoint.text: You arrive at the world spawnpoint. It's a well-forested area, and the ground is scattered with rocks and leaves. On a particularly large bolder, a little girl is sitting and looking at the trees, ("talk girl") and by the entrance to a trail stands a guard. ("talk guard") To the north, you see a small town area, and to the east you see a dirt trail leading into the trees. To the south, you see a snowy area to which a trail of small, tri-pointed tracks lead. To the west, you see a soaring cliff flocked by pigeons.

tundra.name: Tundra
tundra.text: You walk to the precipice of the snow. The change in temperature is immediate and unnatural, you know you can't pass without some form of higher insulation. Farther to the south, sat in the middle of the snow is an odd building surrounded by unidenifiable figures. Back to the north, you can see the spawnpoint, and to the west, you see a fountain.

snowyTrail.name: Snowy Trail
snowyTrail.text: You walk along a snow-covered trail. To the north is the tundra, and to the south is a fort surrounded by small, armed figures. Even though they are clearly protecting the fort, they seem docile enough to let you enter as long as you're friendly.

penguinBase.name: Penguin Base

commander.name: Penguin Commander
commander.text: "Welcome to the penguin army headquarters! Here we have some of the most technologically advanced weaponry, armor, and other items, as well as some other top secret assets and services that I can't tell you about because they're top secret. Did I mention that? They're top secret. The only way you can know about and use our resources is by allying yourself to the penguins! ("ally penguin") Be warned, though, once you ally with us, you won't be able to go back, and you'll never be able to ally yourself with our enemies..."

penguinBase.text: You enter the main area of the base, and it's filled with penguins busily running from one task to the next. They're working at desks with computers, training small regiments, arming and building weapons, and planning on war boards. In the middle of the commotion stands a penguin wearing a healment and holding a clipboard and pen. ("talk commander") To the west is a building labeled "armory". To the north is the snowy trail you entered on.

penguinArmory.name: Penguin Armory

clerk.name: Penguin Clerk
clerk.text:
"Welcome the armory, here you can get kitted up for official battles, or for personal expeditions."
Wares:

Porter - $750

(Use "inspect {item}" or "buy {item}")

porter.name: Porter
porter.description: Allows you to use the "spawn" command to teleport back to the world spawn.

penguinArmory.text: You enter the armory, and see a penguin standing behind a desk and in front of a wall mounted with equipment. ("talk clerk")

cliffside.name: Cliffside
cliffside.text: You walk to the bottom of the cliff. It soars higher now than you could have noticed before; easily over a hundred feet up. The pigeons look at you tauntingly, but you know you will require more than your bare hands to scale the cliff. Farther to the west, on top of the cliff, you see a strange building. Back to the east, you can see the spawnpoint, to the south, you see a fountain, and to the north, you can see what looks like a mineshaft.

fountain.name: Glowing Fountain

squirrel.name: Bizarre Squirrel
squirrel.text: [The squirrel doesn't speak, of course, but you look into its eyes and understand the IT is the source of healing the people speak of, and it will heal you too, for a price. ("heal")]

fountain.text: You walk into an opening in the trees and in the middle is a hill with a gorgeous marble fountain atop it. It looks centuries old, but has somehow remained untarnished, despite being in the only exposed spot in the forest. You immediately understand that it must be magic, to be so beautiful in the face of adveristy. At that very moment, an unusually large squirrel crawls around the side of the fountain and looks at you. It has an exeptionally long tounge, a queer grin, and an equally odd gaze. ("talk squirrel") To the north, you can see the cliffside, and to the east, you can make out the tundra.

rockyTrail.name: Rocky Trail
rockyTrail.text: You come to a rocky gravel trail on top of the cliff. To the east is the cliffside you climbed to get here, and to the west is a building covered in pigeons.

pigeonBase.name: Pigeon Base
pigeonBase.text: The pigeons' base is a towering gothic building made of marble. The door is a massive archway, and inside the building is a hall filled with pigeons seated far above you on the various ledges dotting the walls. On a wall near the entrance, there is a pigeon propaganda poster that says to join the pigeon army. ("ally pigeon") To the west is a grand hall, and to the east is the trail you came on.

pigeonHall.name: Pigeon Hall
pigeonHall.text: In the middle of the otherwise empty hall is a pedestal with a computer monitor on top of it. The monitor is connected to its source by a multitude of snaking cables of varying thickness and color, all leading outwards towards the walls. The screen is red with a single eye in the middle, flitting about nervously until it notices you and the screen goes black. Without the light of the monitor, you can only see enough to walk up to it ("talk computer") or turn around. Back to the east is the entrance to the hall.

town.name: Town Center

merchant.name: Strange Merchant
merchant.text:
"Welcome to my shoppe! Here you can purchase from my endless stock of seemingly random products, ha!"
Wares:

SuperPick - $1000
Dagger - $250
QuickShoes - $750

(Use "inspect {item}" or "buy {item}")

superpick.name: SuperPick
superpick.description: The newest SuperPick model, even though it's not yet released? Grants 35% faster mining speed.

dagger.name: Dagger
dagger.description: A small, shiny dagger. Increases attack damage by 5.

quickshoes.name: QuickShoes
quickshoes.description: Neon pink tennis shoes, ugly but effective. Grants +2 speed.

governor.name: Governor Humdrum
governor.text: "Hello there, commoner. I'm the Governor of prospect town, named for its abundance in gold, and more importantly, prospectors! (Of course, we haven't had much busniness since the great bird war started.) The Birdwatch has taken pretty good care of us, but I'm not as fond of them as the people in the Diner to the north. Their obesession with the Birdwatch has become something of an... Oh- well, never mind that."

prospector.name: Gold Prospector
prospector.text: "Well howdy, kid. If yer lookin' to make a few dimes, I'd suggest you head on over to the gold mines. It don't pay all that well, but I reckon it's better than any other job that silly governor will put you up to."

town.text: You walk to the center of the town and look around. In a corner stands a skinny man with strange eyes and a small table of wares, attached to which is a sign that proclaims it to be a "Shoppe". ("talk merchant") In the center of the square, a man in a tweed suit and tophat is standing by himself. ("talk governor") Back to the south, you can see the spawnpoint, and to the north is a building with a red and white awning, with a sign labeled "BW's Diner".To the west, you see what looks like a mineshaft. A man with a pickaxe and candle with a reflector strapped to his forehead is standing by the entrance trail to the mineshaft. ("talk prospector")

diner.name: Birdwatch Diner

man.name: Retired Birdwatch Guard
man.text:
"Hey. I've seen you new folks roamin' around spawn, but you're the first I seen in here. Hopefully you're wantin' to investigate them pigeons? If ya'd like, I can sell you my old climbing rope for a few bucks, so ya can get up to their sanctuary on top of that old cliff. A warnin', though: Both sides of the war are no good. Don't get any ideas of conspirin' with any of them shady bunch."
Wares:

Rope - $50

(Use "inspect {item}" or "buy {item}")

superpick.name: Rope
superpick.description: Birdwatch standard issue. Old, but strong enough.

man.name: Cook
man.text:
"How're you doing? I've been the cook here for awhile, gotta keep our troops strong. What can I get for you?

(Use "inspect {item}" or "buy {item}")

sandwich.name: Sandwich
sandwich.description: An absolutely massive chicken sandwich. (looks like it used the entire thing) Eat the birds, beat the birds, I guess. Heals 50 HP. ("eat sandwich")

cake.name: Cake
cake.description: What appears to be an entire wedding cake. Heals a whopping 200HP. ("eat cake")

diner.text: You enter the Diner, and notice there are only a few people present, few of them eating. One man sits alone at a table with a drink in hand. He looks older, probably in his late fities. ("talk man") There's only one cook, standing bored behind the counter, waiting for business. ("talk cook") Back to the south is the town.

mine.name: Gold Mine

prospector.name: Gold Prospector
prospector.text: "Hey there, welcome to the gold mine! To start mining, use the command "mine". You'll find yerself some gold sure 'nuff. If you do, bring it to me and I'll take it off yer hands in exchange fer some dough."

mine.text: You walk into the mine's opening, and find a large interior hewn from the rock. Another prospector stands by a torch on one of the support structures. ("talk prospector") Back to the east is the town, and to the south is the cliffside.

trail.name: Beaten Trail
trail.text: You walk along the trail. To the west is the spawnpoint, and the trail continues to the east.

trailTwo.name: Beaten Trail
trailTwo.text: You continue on the trail. It goes on to the east towards a towering fortress, and westward, towards the world spawnpoint. To the north, the trail continues through a more heavily forested area.

fort.name: Birdwatch Fort

scientist.name: Birdwatch Scientist
scientist.text:
"Hello there. I'm the scientist that runs this place, and even if nobody else will admit it, I'm the only reason it's still around... Anything you'd like to purchase?"
Wares:

Coat - $1500
SuperDetector - $2000
Armorplates - $1500
Katana - $2000
Coupon - $15

(Use "inspect {item}" or "buy {item}")

coat.name: Coat
coat.description: A jacket engineered to keep the user at an adjustable temperature in any condition, with science!

superdetector.name: SuperDetector
superdetector.description: A metal detector that helps you find 25% more gold when mining!

armorplates.name: Armorplates
armorplates.description: A vest with armored plating to better defend yourself in a fight. Grants 20 extra HP.

katana.name: Katana
katana.description: A curved sword built from a metal that is both light and strong. Grants 15 extra damage.

coupon.name: Coupon
coupon.description: A coupon for a free meal at the Birdwatch Diner. Maybe the Diner is the key to figure out what's going on...

guard.name: Birdwatch Guard
guard.text: *grunt* "Five minutes 'till my shift is over... I can't see a reason to guard this place, but I gotta get paid somehow. I wish I was guarding the trail to the platinum mines from bandits instead, it wouldn't be too bad to have some exitement for a change..."

fort.text: You walk into the fort, through the opened gates. Even though it looked old outside, it's modern and sleek on the inside. In the middle of the room stands a man next to a few desks covered in computers and other trinkets and gadgets ("talk scientist"), and by the entrance is a lone guard. ("talk guard") Back to the west, you see the trail you came from.

forestTrail.name: Forested Trail

guard.name: Birdwatch Guard
guard.text: "I wouldn't go any farther if I were you, there's a notorious bandit nest farther up north..."

forestTrail.text: You continue along the trail. A guard stands by the trail. ("talk guard") To north is the larger trail, and to the south continues the forested path.

forestTrailTwo.name: Forested Trail
forestTrailTwo.text: You enter a darker part of the trail. The trees are very dense now, and it becomes harder to see where you're going. To the south the trail goes on, and to the north is the entrance to the trail.

forestTrailThree.name: Forested Trail
forestTrailThree.text: You continue on the trail, but it begins to brighten. To the west is what looks like another mine, and to the south is the trail that leads back to the world spawnpoint.

platinumMine.name: Platinum Mine

robot.name: Miner Robot
robot.text: *beep beep* "Hello there. You are currently in the platinum mine. Platinum is number 78 on the periodic table. It takes more time to find, and is rarer, but is worth 50% more than gold. You can mine it using ("mine")"

platinumMine.text: You enter a small cave, dimly lit with shining walls. It looks like nobody has been here for some time, but perhaps that's to your advantage. Then you notice a small, metal figure mining slowly and mechanically. ("talk robot")
